title: Stages TxLookup, TxPool and Finsh stuck at stage 0
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: 2021.10.5-alpha


OS & Version: Linux (20.04.1-Ubuntu)

Commit hash : eacc717a03b8f1eb84e70168c1439f24013b28b6

#### Expected behaviour
Erigon should be fully synced after running 
`./build/bin/erigon --datadir="/media/slyracoon23/Erigon/datadir" --private.api.addr=localhost:9090`

When I run 
`curl -s http://localhost:8545     -X POST     -d '{"method":"eth_blockNumber","params":[],"id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}'     -H "Content-Type: application/json" | jq "{ number: .result }"`

I get should get
```
{
  "number": 0x<blocknumber>
}
```


#### Actual behaviour
I get is
```
{
  "number": "0x0"
}
```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

There is something weird going on when I run 
`./build/bin/integration print_stages --datadir="/media/slyracoon23/Erigon/datadir"`
```

Note: prune_at doesn't mean 'all data before were deleted' - it just mean stage.Prune function were run to this block. Because 1 stage may prune multiple data types to different prune distance.

 			 stage_at 	 prune_at
Headers 		 13571373 	 0
BlockHashes 		 13571373 	 0
Bodies 			 13554546 	 0
Senders 		 13554508 	 0
Execution 		 8231477 	 0
Translation 		 0 		 0
HashState 		 5296320 	 0
IntermediateHashes 	 5296320 	 0
AccountHistoryIndex 	 5296320 	 0
StorageHistoryIndex 	 5296320 	 0
LogIndex 		 5296320 	 0
CallTraces 		 5296320 	 0
TxLookup 		 0 		 0
TxPool 			 0 		 0
Finish 			 0 		 0
--
prune distance: --prune=
```
TxLookup, TxPool and Finish are 0.

#### Backtrace
rpcdaemon logs

It seems stuck on 7/18 Execution

You are just syncing. Nothing bad in logs now.
During genesis sync all stages must be 0 until Execution is done. 
By some reason you get forward. Not dangerous - just slower. 

Without logs - can’t know what was wromg.
@AskAlexSharov Thanks for taking a look. Is there anyway to tell how close my Erigon client is done with syncing?
You see progress in “ print_stages” all stages need get to highest block. You are somewhat 40% done.
